## Public Member Functions

### addScavengingFrameIndex() {#aecaae26e25f7f952810d98e50264b5fb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::RegScavenger::addScavengingFrameIndex (int FI)"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Add a scavenging frame index.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h/#l00112">112</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h">RegisterScavenging.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### assignRegToScavengingIndex() {#a349def858d7ff22474b3f9013486807f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::RegScavenger::assignRegToScavengingIndex (int FI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; Restore=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> that <code>Reg</code> is in use at scavenging index <code>FI</code>.

This is for targets which need to directly manage the spilling process, and need to update the scavenger&#39;s internal state. It&#39;s expected this be called a second time with <code>Restore</code> set to a non-null value, so that the externally inserted restore instruction resets the scavenged slot liveness when encountered.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h">RegisterScavenging.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### backward() {#a4a44764b1c5681c8fb057f13b3f30047}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void RegScavenger::backward ()">
Update internal register state and move MBB iterator backwards.

This method gives precise results even in the absence of kill flags.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h/#l00093">93</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h">RegisterScavenging.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerscavenging-cpp/#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerscavenging-cpp">RegisterScavenging.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### scavengeRegisterBackwards() {#a62d08c8303092539ecb1fde389108e7a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Register RegScavenger::scavengeRegisterBackwards (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &amp; RC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> To, bool RestoreAfter, int SPAdj, bool AllowSpill=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}>
Make a register of the specific register class available from the current position backwards to the place before <code>To</code>.

If <code>RestoreAfter</code> is true this includes the instruction following the current position. SPAdj is the stack adjustment due to call frame, it&#39;s passed along to eliminateFrameIndex(). Returns the scavenged register.

If <code>AllowSpill</code> is false, fail if a spill is required to make the register available, and return NoRegister.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h">RegisterScavenging.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerscavenging-cpp/#l00295">295</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerscavenging-cpp">RegisterScavenging.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### spill() {#a321eac3fed6b98ad50c1695ad13cd51f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RegScavenger::ScavengedInfo &amp; RegScavenger::spill (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &amp; RC, int SPAdj, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> Before, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; UseMI)</>}>
Spill a register after position <code>After</code> and reload it before position <code>UseMI</code>.
